properties.name: app.database.p6spy
properties.description: P6Spy is a framework that enables database data to be seamlessly intercepted and logged with no code changes to existing application.

properties.name: app.database.migrations.prefix
properties.description: File name prefix for SQL migrations.

properties.name: app.database.migrations.separator
properties.description: File name separator for SQL migrations.

properties.name: app.email.host
properties.description: E-mail host from which messages will be sent.

properties.name: app.email.port
properties.description: E-mail port from which messages will be sent.

properties.name: app.email.login
properties.description: E-mail login from which messages will be sent.

properties.name: app.email.password
properties.description: E-mail password from which messages will be sent.
